title: Pool party reksai is broken (2 snorkels?)

embed.description: Hey guys! So i noticed that the back animation for Pool party Rek'Sai is bugged, if you recall at first nothing is wrong but once you learned W and burrow yourself in and out in your recall instead of eating the frog you stay still, this only happens when you W yourself and your recall animation will not work properly.

body:
Pool party rek'sai's body/sculpture? is broken. Instead of having 1 snorkel on 1 side and the little bracelet on her left side. she has 2 snorkels and 2 bracelet. Riot please fix this, i bought this skin and i am kinda disapointed.

I found this vid on youtube displaying another bug that got fixed since then. But if you pause and look at reksai she has 2 snorkels and 2 bracelets, this is still a bug for me, however if you own this skin and dont see this bug, please write so in the comments :)

replies.body:
Hey Thunderboy,

Thanks for the report! I was able to repro this. I'll take a look and see what's going on here. ^-^
No problem always happy to help if something is wrong :D
